newsitem.title: POLAND: Elektromontaz to issue up to 2 mln shares.
newsitem.headline: Elektromontaz to issue up to 2 mln shares.

text.p: Polish construction company Elektromontaz Export SA plans to increase its capital by issuing between one and two million new shares ex-rights, the company said in a statement on Tuesday.
"We propose increasing our capital by issuing not less than one million shares and not more than two million shares...with a nominal value of one zloty each," the statement said.
The issue, subject to approval by a general shareholders' meeting, will be carried out through a public subscription for packages of at least 30,000 shares.
The company's shareholders will be offered a tranche of 500,000 new shares seven days before the subscription.
Elektromontaz's capital consists of 8,665,500 shares, with a one zloty nominal value each.
